name: Storage Overflow
description:
We are aware of an issue regarding the font in the WebGL Build. If possible, we would suggest playing the Windows Build.

“Storage Overflow” is a puzzle/simulator game where you manage a small warehouse. You have to deliver packages as fast as possible in order to overcome the amount of stocking-up packages and not run out of space.

“Storage Overflow” is an entry for the Ludum Dare 42 game jam.

Gameplay

In this game, you play as a warehouse keeper. Trucks will start delivering packages from the left side to your warehouse, once the game starts. You need to store the packages in your warehouse so you have quick access to them when needed. After some time, trucks will start coming from the right side with delivery requests. You have to fill them with the required packages within the time limit. Your goal is to deliver packages as fast as possible in order to not run out of space from shelving packages filling up your warehouse. For successful deliveries, you will receive money and reputation. Money can be spent for upgrades on the workbench inside your warehouse, including extending the storage space of the warehouse. You lose if your reputation stays too low for too long. Hence, always try to deliver those packages on time.

Technical Details
  • The game was made in Unity 2D
  • All sounds and graphics were made by ourselves
What we would have added or changed if there was more time
  • Controller support
  • Multiplayer support
  • More upgrades
  • More (funny) package types
  • …
